column5: You hooked up with Sturgeon while with Eddie? My partner is bouncing off the ceiling thinking about snagging a sturgeon..lol. Cheers
Walleye, i will let you know how melchett is this year(june 3rd.) also, i will see you on the dock at eddies(aug 27th). Can not wait..
GOBIG, two trips this summer....lucky SOB!!!
I follow very good and sound advise. Be nice to the wife and you will always go back twice. I just got to behave the other 50 weeks of the year.:d
Even if it is just October it is not too early to book your 2011 trip. Our deposit is on the way to Nakina and we are counting the days.
Hi Onetimedave, I agree we too have all our 2011 dates and deposits in place. It gives us more time to prepare and the group commitments are finalized. Have a great 2011 year.Thank you,Larry Mac
Hi Larry How ya been...looking forward to 2011 with a little more consistent weather...see you at the All Canada show?
Good tip dave, Im gonna have my 2011 trip deposits early to.

My wife said that I am always one season away from the present. I told her her have to plan ahead. It is now bow hunting but I can't help but dream about the trip we have booked for next June to Ogoki Reservoir. When I started going in June I found out real quickly to book early. You can normally always get a late July or early August booking . I like the June fishing . It is right after turkey season and 6 weeks or so before our bear hunt . Always got to plan ahead !!!!!!!!!!!!! My Mom is that way too and she is 91 and still going strong . I think that helps her too. Positive mind and attitude !!
Hi Glen, Great to hear from you. We will definately see you at the show. Thank you,Larry Mac
Where are you heading this year Dave? Are you going back to Melchett?
Yes we will be at Melchett. Flying in on May 27th. Can't wait.
Lucky buck, looks like I have to wait till August this year. Gonna miss Melchett this year, we are going up to Attawapiskat instead. Rob
you going with eddie-we were on windsor lake a few years ago-watch out for the sturgeon up there.we are going out of red lake this year.have fun.
